sentences.english: A number of investigators have used the fluorescent-antibody (FA) technique for Salmonella detection.
sentences.chinese: 因此，沙门氏菌检测的荧光抗体技术为能被广范应用。

sentences.english: The antibodies have been altered to fluoresce under certain conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在一定条件下，这些抗体被变成能发出荧光。

sentences.english: Explosion hazardous area 2 usually adopts safety-increased explosion-proof fluorescent lamp.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸危险2区内一般使用增安型防爆荧光灯照明。

sentences.english: The fluorescence stain in chondrocyte was quenched with laser.
sentences.chinese: 激光淬灭软骨细胞内的荧光染料。

sentences.english: This is because connections are vulnerable to breaking due to the flexible screen.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为由于柔性荧光屏易碎致使连接脆弱。

sentences.english: They chose this gene because it is easy to see with a florescent light.
sentences.chinese: 他们选择了这种基因，因为它很容易看到与荧光光线。

sentences.english: When the DNA pass over the beam, the labels fluoresce.
sentences.chinese: 当DNA经过光束时标记物发出荧光。

sentences.english: The design of the film-systems used for bio-fluorescence excitation and barrier filters were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述生物荧光激发滤光片及栅滤光片的膜系设计。

sentences.english: As for the fluorescent powder quality sorting, yanchao lights available comparison test. & k2 ]!
sentences.chinese: 至于荧光粉品质的分选，可用验钞灯作对比检验。

sentences.english: Weak green-yellow fluorescence under UV light.
sentences.chinese: 紫外光照射发弱绿黄色荧光。

sentences.english: We order this brand of light stick because of its quality.
sentences.chinese: 我们购买该品牌的荧光棒是因为它的质量。

sentences.english: GFP has also been used for more, um, creative purposes.
sentences.chinese: 绿色荧光蛋白还具有更富创造性的用途。

sentences.english: Malondialdehyde(MDA) consistency in rats serum was measured when performing cryotherapy by means of fluorescence method.
sentences.chinese: 采用荧光法测定大鼠冷冻前后血清MDA浓度。

sentences.english: Compact florescent light bulbs, on the other hand, are a somewhat different story.
sentences.chinese: 相反，紧凑型荧光灯泡有些不同。

sentences.english: There was more hoopla surrounding the introduction of incandescent lights than there seems to be surrounding compact fluorescents.
sentences.chinese: 当时，引进白炽灯可比引进紧凑荧光灯热闹许多。

sentences.english: This article reviewed the progress of solid state sources catch up with florescent lamps.
sentences.chinese: 综述近三年来固态光源追赶荧光灯的进展。

definition: Taiwan variant of 熒光|荧光[ying2 guang1]
light/beam of light/gleam of light/light reflected from an object
Guangze county in Nanping 南平[Nan2 ping2] Fujian
